author: tr1.xxy
content: There isn't any difference between [Deneb lc full node](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/deneb/light-client/full-node.md#modified-block_to_light_client_header) and [Electra lc full node](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/electra/light-client/full-node.md#modified-block_to_light_client_header) right now (apart from some removed comments). Is it something still WIP, otherwise why don't we just remove the Electra one?
